game.name: MOVING WITH THE MOON: Mastering Universal Gravitation!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a new action game where you steer the earth. Steer the Earth, when both the Earth and the Moon are in the goal zone, the stage is cleared. Stars are constantly pulling on each other with universal gravitation. You can experience a simulated universal gravitation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a new action game where you steer the earth. Steer the Earth, when both the Earth and the Moon are in the goal zone, the stage is cleared. Stars are constantly pulling on each other with universal gravitation. You can experience a simulated universal gravitation.
